name: Shoot Your Problems Away (Kade Richards)
description:
In this game, you must maintain all 4 of your 'Wellbeing Meters'. Be careful, robots who remind you of all you're mistakes will try and drain your meters. If you can last for 3 minutes, you win!

To maintain your 'Wellbeing Meters', head to the room colour coordinated to the meter you wish to fill.

  • Social (Blue)
    Stay and hang out with your friends at a local café, while fending off incoming robots. Stay in the blue highlighted circle to regenerate your 'Social Wellness'
  • Physical (Green)
    Remember, good cardio is important to a healthy life, so do some laps in the field to build up your 'Physical Wellness', while fending off robots.
  • Academic (Orange)
    Gotta stay focused to get those straight A's! In the classroom you need to get rid of all distractions (mainly robots) to build up your 'Academic Wellness'.
  • Financial (Red)
    Money makes the world go around, including your wellbeing (very tragic). Get to relocating boxes found on the factory, indicated by a red ghost of the box, to earn some money 'Financial Wellbeing'.

Made by Daniel Sohler & Kade Richards, during the April 2022, AIE Gameplus Gamejam. Made with the theme of Wellbeing.

Controls:
W,A,S,D: Up, Left, Down, Right in game
Left Mouse Button: Fire gun
